alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 3:13AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The eastern shore of Maryland, northern and central Delaware, far southeastern Pennsylvania, and much of central and southern New Jersey. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to begin Friday evening in Delmarva and southern New Jersey, spreading northward overnight into Saturday morning. Snow may be heavy at times through early afternoon before diminishing late in the day. Winds may generate areas of blowing snow and low visibilities at times. The storm total snow forecast remains very uncertain, so stay tuned to the latest forecasts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
